excerpt: If you missed the Amazon Prime Day Deal of grabbing some AirPods for just $89, well you’re in luck because that deal is back from Amazon. Additionally, you’ll be able to snag AirPods Pr…
text: If you missed the Amazon Prime Day Deal of grabbing some AirPods for just $89, well you’re in luck because that deal is back from Amazon. Additionally, you’ll be able to snag AirPods Pro 2 for $169, $100 off Apple Watch, and $150 off the MacBook Air series too. AirPods 4 – $89 (30% off $129) AirPods 4 are discounted by 30% from Apple’s retail price, available at just $89. AirPods 4 are the popular wireless earbuds out there for a reason, featuring an iconic design, and great features like gesture support, spatial audio, voice isolation, water and sweat resistance, Siri support, and USB-C charging. Get AirPods 4 for $89 (down 30% from $129) AirPods Pro 2 with Hearing Aid Functionality – $169 (down from $249) AirPods Pro 2 have all the features of AirPods 4 plus more, most notable being FDA approved hearing aid functionality for mild to moderate hearing loss, high fidelity sound, active noise cancellation, water resistance and sweat resistance, Spatial Audio, custom fit, transparency mode, ear detection, Siri support, and a USB-C charging case. AirPods Pro 2 – $169 (down from $249) Apple Watch Series 10 – $299 (down from $399) Apple Watch Series 10 continues to be available at a great discount, taking $100 off the retail price. Apple Watch 10 has an always-on 42mm display, fitness and activity tracking capabilities, heart rate monitor, ECG with irregular heart beat detection, crash detection, fall detection, Emergency SOS, ovulation tracking, GPS, pinch gesture support for one handed operation, water resistance, voice control, Siri commands, all-day battery life, and more. Get Apple Watch Series 9 for $299 (down from $399 MSRP) M4 MacBook Air – from $849 Amazon continues to offer incredible deals on M4 Macbook Air models, stating at $849 for the 16GB/256GB base 13″ model in various color options, but there are great deals on every screen size and configuration option. 13″ M4 MacBook Air 16GB / 256GB for $849 (MSRP: $999) 13″ M4 MacBook Air 16GB / 512GB for $1,099 (MSRP: $1,199) 13″ M4 MacBook Air 24GB / 512GB for $1,299 (MSRP: $1,399) 15″ M4 MacBook Air 24GB / 512GB for $1,449 (MSRP: $1,599) 15″ M4 MacBook Air 16GB / 256GB for $1,099 (MSRP: $1,199) 15″ M4 MacBook Air 16GB / 512GB for $1,299 (MSRP: $1,399) FTC: OSXDaily is an affiliate partner with Amazon, meaning if you click a link and make a purchase, we may receive a small payment which goes towards keeping the site running.
html:
If you missed the Amazon Prime Day Deal of grabbing some AirPods for just $89, well you’re in luck because that deal is back from Amazon. Additionally, you’ll be able to snag AirPods Pro 2 for $169, $100 off Apple Watch, and $150 off the MacBook Air series too.

AirPods 4 – $89 (30% off $129)

AirPods 4 are discounted by 30% from Apple’s retail price, available at just $89. AirPods 4 are the popular wireless earbuds out there for a reason, featuring an iconic design, and great features like gesture support, spatial audio, voice isolation, water and sweat resistance, Siri support, and USB-C charging.

  • Get AirPods 4 for $89 (down 30% from $129)

AirPods Pro 2 with Hearing Aid Functionality – $169 (down from $249)

AirPods Pro 2 have all the features of AirPods 4 plus more, most notable being FDA approved hearing aid functionality for mild to moderate hearing loss, high fidelity sound, active noise cancellation, water resistance and sweat resistance, Spatial Audio, custom fit, transparency mode, ear detection, Siri support, and a USB-C charging case.

  • AirPods Pro 2 – $169 (down from $249)

Apple Watch Series 10 – $299 (down from $399)

Apple Watch Series 10 continues to be available at a great discount, taking $100 off the retail price. Apple Watch 10 has an always-on 42mm display, fitness and activity tracking capabilities, heart rate monitor, ECG with irregular heart beat detection, crash detection, fall detection, Emergency SOS, ovulation tracking, GPS, pinch gesture support for one handed operation, water resistance, voice control, Siri commands, all-day battery life, and more.

  • Get Apple Watch Series 9 for $299 (down from $399 MSRP)

M4 MacBook Air – from $849

Amazon continues to offer incredible deals on M4 Macbook Air models, stating at $849 for the 16GB/256GB base 13″ model in various color options, but there are great deals on every screen size and configuration option.

  • 13″ M4 MacBook Air 16GB / 256GB for $849 (MSRP: $999)
  • 13″ M4 MacBook Air 16GB / 512GB for $1,099 (MSRP: $1,199)
  • 13″ M4 MacBook Air 24GB / 512GB for $1,299 (MSRP: $1,399)
  • 15″ M4 MacBook Air 24GB / 512GB for $1,449 (MSRP: $1,599)
  • 15″ M4 MacBook Air 16GB / 256GB for $1,099 (MSRP: $1,199)
  • 15″ M4 MacBook Air 16GB / 512GB for $1,299 (MSRP: $1,399)

FTC: OSXDaily is an affiliate partner with Amazon, meaning if you click a link and make a purchase, we may receive a small payment which goes towards keeping the site running.
